content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1607596851566{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

AqualisBraemar enters Chinese offshore aquaculture partnership LATEST NEWS AqualisBraemar LOC CEO to speak at SpareBank1 Energy Conference LATEST NEWS Meet the Team: Mingkwan Surasorn LATEST NEWS Marine, engineering and adjusting consultants to the Renewables, Maritime, Oil & Gas and Power sectors [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”20″ content_placement=”top” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”8906″ parallax_speed_bg=”2″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612360999416{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_cta h2=”Who we are” h2_font_container=”font_size:30px|color:%23ffffff” h2_use_theme_fonts=”yes” shape=”square” style=”flat” css_animation=”none” use_custom_fonts_h2=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1612362124193{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”]AqualisBraemar is a leading and independent marine, engineering and adjusting consultancy. We work in energy and oceans to de-risk and drive the energy transition in the renewables, maritime, oil and gas, and power sectors. Bringing our clients the deepest pool of multi-disciplined capabilities across 200 locations, we combine a legacy of more than 150 years in the maritime sector with cutting-edge engineering and innovation. We can support our clients in navigating the tides of change without ever compromising our mission to seek the truth in all that we do – Quaerite Vera.[/vc_cta][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612360713891{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_cta h2=”Talk to our experts” h2_font_container=”font_size:30px|color:%23ffffff|line_height:36px” h2_use_theme_fonts=”yes” shape=”square” style=”flat” css_animation=”none” use_custom_fonts_h2=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1612360440419{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”]
